ManagedBean for Applcore Page Templates. This class contain Applcore Page Templates related utility methods.

Constructor Detail

ApplcoreShellBean

public ApplcoreShellBean()
Method Detail

getShellType

public java.lang.String getShellType()
Returns UIShell page template type of the current page. This api should not be used within a remote region provider.

Returns:
classic if the page uses Classic UIShell template or simple if the page uses Simple UIShell template.
